name: stock_v2_get_valuation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the valuation data for a given stock using its performance ID.

performanceid.description: The value of the performanceId field from endpoints like /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers. It specifies the stock for which to fetch the valuation data.
